title: Spare tubes? Extra bottles? The new Tailfin Mini Cage can carry it all
content:
If you’re into bikepacking, you’ve probably given a lot of thought to carrying extra gear on your bike. For everyone else, there’s a good chance you have some empty braze ons somewhere on your bike. Whatever the case, Tailfin has a new option for carrying additional cargo on your bike that should appeal to just

The post Spare tubes? Extra bottles? The new Tailfin Mini Cage can carry it all appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Zach Overholt
